name: THINGS ARE NOT WHAT THEY SEEM AT THE CHILDREN'S MOONBASE HOSPITAL
name_original: THINGS ARE NOT WHAT THEY SEEM AT THE CHILDREN'S MOONBASE HOSPITAL
description:
THINGS ARE NOT WHAT THE SEEM AT THE CHILDREN'S MOONBASE HOSPITAL

CLICK GAME SCREEN THEN PRESS ANY KEY TO START

Move with arrows

Hold D to shoot

SAVE THE CHILDREN

Art by Jacqueline Stone, Mark Miller, and Don Boody

Programming by Don Boody

A short game made in <48 hrs for BGSJAM4, June 2015
